title: Potential Secrets / Future Plots
content:
Hooks & Secrets:
Vision of a Betrayer: He recently dreamt of a “golden-eyed child drowning beneath a crimson wheel,” a vision he interprets as a coming betrayal within the Shemsu-Ra.

Biomantic Heresy: Rumour holds he experimented with forbidden biomantic rites learned from a Bitterbark emissary, melding divination with biological augmentation—an act punishable by dismemberment.

Crimson Sands Whisperer: During the Festival of Crimson Sands, he chooses one gladiator each month and gives them a secret blessing—or curse—ensuring they either rise in glory or fall with a message written in blood.
